en-US.name: Plant Ranger Check
en-US.summary: Check your plant health status using Plant Ranger API
en-US.description: Plant Ranger Check helps you monitor the health of your plants by connecting to the Plant Ranger API. Simply ask "check my plant health" to get a status update on your plants. The skill uses OAuth authentication to securely access your plant data.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This skill requires OAuth authentication with the Plant Ranger API. Users will need to connect their account through the Alexa app before they can check plant health.
